Accessing your API and Player Keys

Dec 1, 2014

To interact with the Zype API, you will need your API Key and Player Key. This tutorial will show you how to find these keys from the Zype Platform.

Step 1

Click the settings icon in the top navbar.

Step 2

In the dropdown, select API

Step 3

You will be directed to the API credentials page.
